wikipedia_page.main: Tony Hart CBE (11 September 1923 – 13 June 2009) was a British businessman and Conservative leader of Kent County Council between 1984 and 1992. During his leadership of Kent County Council, Hart negotiated and oversaw the development of the Channel Tunnel, the High Speed Rail Link and the Dartford Bridge.

response: * Tony Hart CBE (1923–2009), leader of Kent C.C. during the development of the Channel Tunnel, Eurostar and the Dartford Bridge
* Tony Hart (theater) (1855 – 1891), American actor, comedian and singer
* Tony Hart (politician) (1923 – 2009), British businessman and politician
* Tony Hart (1925 – 2009), British children's television personality and artist
* Tony Hart (businessman) (1932 – 2020), Jamaican businessman, philanthropist, and politician
